article_metadata.description: Late last month, Hillary Clinton began releasing the details for her vision for health reform. But that vision is little more than Obamacare on steroids. At every level of her plan, Clinton uses Obamacare's flaws as an excuse for more mandates, more regulations, and more taxes.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes

og.description: Late last month, Hillary Clinton began releasing the details for her vision for health reform. But that vision is little more than Obamacare on steroids. At every level of her plan, Clinton uses Obamacare's flaws as an excuse for more mandates, more regulations, and more taxes.
og.title: Hillary Clinton's Answer To Obamacare: More Government
